chart.title: Dealt with anxiety or depression by taking prescribed medication
chart.subtitle: Respondents who reported that they 'felt so anxious or depressed that they could not continue their regular daily activities as they normally would for two weeks or longer' were asked whether they ever took prescribed medication to make themselves feel better.

Share - Question: mh8d - Took prescribed.citationShort: – processed by Our World in Data
